system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: All [Terrain] effects on the Field are cleared.

Requirement: [Lycanroc] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Stone Edge on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Spintered Stormshards
